tbw50A1KPRSHs3enY.name: Panic Attacks (Crippling, 3d minutes)
tbw50A1KPRSHs3enY.notes:
You have -4 to all attribute and skill rolls, and -6 to active
		defenses. You can't move from the spot, although you may cower (crouch).
		At the beginning of the attack, you lose 3 FP. At the end, the GM will
		immediately roll again to see if it triggers another attack!

t7_VZUWNhxBq9i8kG.name: Panic Attacks (Mild, 2d seconds)
t7_VZUWNhxBq9i8kG.notes: You have -2 to all attribute and skill rolls, and -4 to active defenses.

tzBUYVBtBfHzTkAOc.name: Panic Attacks (Severe, 1d minutes)
tzBUYVBtBfHzTkAOc.notes:
You have -3 to all attribute and skill rolls, and -5 to active
		defenses. You can't move from the spot unless you flee at full Move from it!
		At the beginning of the attack, you lose 2 FP.

mrvU5ycT3VVbCfGRC.name: Reaction Bonus
mrvU5ycT3VVbCfGRC.notes: Devotees of the old and beautiful.

mCXISeb2sLXQYnKeF.name: Alternate Benefit
mCXISeb2sLXQYnKeF.notes: Applies to science skills when used at lower TL

mMvsQA1CZgLR1Tt8g.name: Alternate Benefit
mMvsQA1CZgLR1Tt8g.notes: IQ-4+level to notice anything odd in an area you have lived 6-level months

mqtQu74scGpMhFvEz.name: Reaction Bonus
mqtQu74scGpMhFvEz.notes: Students of the arcane, gullible college students, and monster-hunters

mTKgB5MvzC5MfnEej.name: Alternate Benefit
mTKgB5MvzC5MfnEej.notes: Bonus to fright checks due to supenatural beings or sanity destroying tomes

miz2tsF0eWcSKQteH.name: Alternate Benefit
miz2tsF0eWcSKQteH.notes: Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.
